title: 追夢的香港人 The Hongkongers who are dreaming

replies.msg:
追夢的香港人

「The city is dying」，相信有看電視習慣的人，對這句對白都不會太陌生。2011年，天與地這套討論社會議題的劇集早已講到，社會上每一個就像被倒模出來一樣。在填鴨式的教育底下，每個人都被訓練得一模一樣，以追求金錢為目標，缺乏了批判性思維。

曾經，我以為這句對白真的正在反映社會現象。但是，在這一個夢裡面，我見到的是，「追夢的香港人」。每個人都擁有同一個願望，為同一個目標打拼。為的，並不是什麼一千幾百元的回報，而只是奪回本來屬於自己的家。對於批評年輕人的人，我想問一句，「為什麼爭取本來屬於自己的東西，是一件錯的事？為什麼，你們只會指責年輕人破壞社會的安寧，卻沒有責罵過問題的根源，『暴政』」？

在這個夢入面，有很多存在已久的問題逐漸浮現。官黑勾結，警權過大，選擇性執法，等等。為什麼，一直努力為這個家打拼的香港人會受到這樣的對待？為什麼，我們要交稅給這個暴政對付我們？如果你說，年輕人上街，是值得暴力對待的話，請你將來不要為你今天所說的一切而後悔。年輕人正在做的就是，守護這一個家，守護你們曾經引以自豪的香港，守護他們下一代的自由。你可以不支持他們的行為，但請你不要站在暴徒的一方，責罵我們。

曾經，我會認真香港人早已沒有夢想。可是，這一次，有好多香港人都在發同一個夢。每個週末，夢見自己和平遊行，夢見自己在前線對抗暴政。即使，在這個夢裡面，我們經常感到憤怒，感到氣餒，感到絕望，但是我們從不放棄。在暴政面前，我們選擇團結，不篤灰，不割蓆。每個人都扮演著不同的角色，目的就只是爭取本來屬於我們的自由。

自由，是一件很空泛的概念，但亦都是一個很簡單的概念。自由，只不過就是在維持道德標準的情況下，有權利去選擇做一件自己想做的事，就例如是香港人引以為傲的言論自由，集會自由，新聞自由，等等。為何爭取被蠶蝕的自由，是一件錯的事？

連登裡面，曾經有一個留言，令人很感動。「我希望有一日，我們香港人夢醒時，可以除下眼罩及口罩，好好認識曾經一起抵抗暴政的兄弟姐妹。」我真的很希望，有這一日的來臨。最後，我希望大家珍惜生命。有人說過，對於一個人最好的報復，就是要活得比它好。面對暴政，我相信只要我們一日心存希望，終於一天，這個夢想必定可以達到。

The Hongkongers who are dreaming

‘The city is dying”. For those who watched TVB, I believe you may be familiar with this dialogue. In 2011, When Heaven Burns, the TV drama which discussed about the controversial topics in the society, has already mentioned that everyone is being moulded as identical. Under the spoon-feeding education system, everyone has been trained to be exactly the same, pursuing money as the main goal, lacking of the critical thinking.

I used to think the dialogue was really reflecting the truth in the society. However, with this dream, what I can see is a bunch of Hongkongers pursuing a dream. Everyone has the same wish, fighting for the same goal. The reason behind is not because of the few thousands or few hundreds hong kong dollar as reward. This is because we are trying to regain the home that used to belong to us. To those criticise the teenagers, I would like to ask you question. Why is it wrong if we are just trying get back what used to belong to us? Why do you just blame on teenagers on destroying the peace of society, instead of condemning the tyranny which is the root cause of all the problems?

In this dream, lots of long-lasting issues have been arisen. The cooperation between the government and the triads, over-powerful police, selective arrest and etc. Why do the teenagers who are trying our best to fight against the government have to suffer from the unfair treatment? Why do we have to pay the tax to the government to treat us violently? If you said, teenagers who participating in the protests deserve such violent treatments, please don’t regret for what you have said in the future. What we are doing is to protect our home, to protect the Hong Kong that we used to be proud of, to protest the freedom of our next generation. You can disagree what we have done but please, don’t stand with the rioters, the tyranny and the triads and blaming on us.

I used to believe that Hongkonger do not have dream anymore. However, I can see many Hongkongers dreaming in this time. 2 millions and 6 Hongkongers are trying our best to fight for what we are desperately hoping for. Every weekend, many Hongkongers are having the dream. We dream that they are having peaceful protest. We dream we fight against the riot police at the frontline. Even though we always feel angry, feel tired, feel desperate, but we have never given up. In front of the tyranny, we chose to unite and never isolate each other. We are acting different roles in the dream to regain the freedom we used to have.

Freedom is an abstract concept but is also a simple concept. Freedom is just we can choose to do whatever we want under the circumstance that the moral standard has been followed. For example, those the freedom we used to be product of, such as the freedom of speech, freedom of assembly, freedom of the press, and etc. Why getting back the losing freedom is wrong?

In LIHKG, one of the famous forums in Hong Kong, has a comment left by Hongkonger which is really touching. “I hope in one day, when Hongkongers wake up from the dream, we can take off the goggles and the marks, having a chance to see the faces of all the dreamers”. I truly wish it will happen in one day. Last but not least, I hope everyone can cherish your own life. Someone has said that, the best revenge to the person you hate is to live out a fabulous life. Facing the tyranny, I believe the day will come if we never give up.

‼️從近日的新聞報導，香港已經開始陷入第4步，一旦到了第9、第10步就已經太遲了，⚠必須在第8步前停下才有希望，不然，香港就會變成另一個烏克蘭🤯！這是從2014年已被預測的。
